action.action-desc: Mr. Bridenstine introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To prohibit the Federal Government from contracting with entities that donate or match employee donations to Planned Parenthood Federation of America, Inc.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Government Refusal of Abortion in Contracting and Enterprise or the GRACE Act.

section.header: Prohibition on contracting with entities that donate to Planned Parenthood Federation of America, Inc

subsection.text: A Federal entity may not enter into a contract with a person or entity that donates or matches employee donations to Planned Parenthood Federation of America, Inc., or any affiliate or clinic of Planned Parenthood Federation of America, Inc.

paragraph.text: to contracts entered into after the date of the enactment of this Act; and
to subcontracts (at any tier) awarded under such contracts.
